dmca.title: Notice of Petition For Pre-Litigation Discovery
dmca.body:
NOTICE OF PETITION FOR PRE-LITIGATION DISCOVERY
We are writing to inform you that Yahoo! has been served with a 
Petition for Pre-litigation Discovery to provide information 
related to your user account at Yahoo!.  

The information is sought in an action entitled:
  Dynacq International, Inc. v. Yahoo! Inc., Cause No. GN202048 pending in: 
  53rd Judicial District Court of Texas, Travis County, Texas

The Petition, filed on 06/26/2002, is set for hearing on 
07/15/2002.  Should the Petitioner prevail at this hearing, 
Yahoo! may be required to produce certain documents related to 
your Yahoo! account. 

The attorney for the Petitioner, Dynacq International, Inc., is: [Private]

You may wish to consult an attorney to advise you about the 
foregoing.  Please contact the petitioning party to obtain a copy 
of the  petition.  If you wish to contact Yahoo! regarding this 
matter, please direct your correspondence to 
notice-user@yahoo-inc.com
